stages.name: Physical Proximity and Rogue AP Setup
Broadcast Evil Twin SSID (Similar to Legitimate Network)
Victim Device Scans and Detects Rogue AP (Randomness: Victim Location/Public WiFi Usage)
Victim Selects and Attempts Connection to Rogue AP (Controls: User Awareness Training, Auto-Connect Features)
Bypass or Capture Authentication (Open WiFi or Captive Portal Spoofing)
Establish ARP Poisoning or DHCP Spoofing for Traffic Redirection
DNS Spoofing to Redirect Traffic to Malicious Proxy/Server (Controls: DNS over HTTPS Enabled vs Plain DNS)
Intercept and Strip SSL/TLS (SSL Stripping) (Controls: HSTS Enabled, HSTS Preload Lists)
Bypass Certificate Validation (Ignore Chain Errors or Fake Certs) (Controls: Browser Cert Pinning, User Alert Handling)
Capture Sensitive Data (Credentials, Sessions) from Intercepted Traffic
Exfiltrate Captured Data Without Detection (Controls: EDR, Network Monitoring)
